Headline: Update: No trains between Ashland and the Loop
ShortDescription: Update: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and the Loop due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Ashland and the Loop due to signal problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between 54th/Cermak and Ashland at this time.

Passengers may use #20 Madison buses as an alternative to Green and Pink Line service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Correction: Green Line on Loop 'L' rerouted via Wells, Van Buren
ShortDescription: Correction: Green Line service has been rerouted via the Wells and Van Buren sides of Loop due to a loss of power affecting service near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: Green Line service has been rerouted via the Wells and Van Buren sides of Loop due to a loss of power affecting service near Clark/Lake.
On the Loop 'L', Green Line trains will serve Washington/Wells, Quincy, LaSalle/Van Buren and H.W. Library-State/Van Buren stations instead of their usual stops.
· For Green Line service: 
· Board Harlem-bound Green Line trains on what is normally the Orange Line side at these stations. 
· Board 63rd-bound Green Line trains on what is usually the Brown Line side at these stations.
There is currently no Green Line service on the Lake and Wabash sides of the Loop 'L' (including Clark/Lake, State/Lake, Washington/Wabash and Adams/Wabash).
See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.
We appreciate your patience as we work to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/95th
ShortDescription: SB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via: Stony Island, 95th, Jeffery, 100th, Yates and 103rd, due to, street blockage, near Stony Island/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Stony Island, 95th, Jeffery, 100th, Yates and 103rd, due to, street blockage, near Stony Island/95th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a door problem. 

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
